testcase.name: TC07_read_account_information_type
testcase.system-out: Given user connects to the database.........................................passed And user gets the "*" from "tp_account" table...............................passed And verify the row count....................................................passed And verify "tp_account" table "account_type" column contains "CHECKING" data.passed And verify "tp_account" table "account_type" column contains "SAVING" data..passed And verify "tp_account" table "account_type" column contains "INVESTING" data.passed And verify "tp_account" table "account_type" column contains "CREDIT_CARD" data.passed Then close the database connection..........................................passed
